name: Chromatic Guardian of Scarlet
description:
This is my entry for the Bullet Hell Artistry #3 competition on the Discord server, Bullet Hell Engines, in which the theme is to take an early-game canon Touhou boss and scale them up to  a final boss-tier fight.

We got 6 weeks to work on this, and I ended up only portioning out three days. Whoops! What I've done feels serviceable though, and I've already made peace with forfeiting top 3 :notungood:

With the exception of the background images which I lifted from Google Images (sorry!), I made everything here, from the graphics to the programming, music, and to a fair share of the sound effects.

I was going to make Super Mode accessible, but I cancelled that in favor of getting some sleep today. If people are interested, I'm totally down with going back and adding difficulty settings for this fight.
